data.persona: I grow the best wheat in the whole Kingdom, for no other wheat can match in the rise it gives a loaf of bread or the delicateness of a pastry.  Though I toil from dusk til dawn, at the end of the day I get a quiet sense of pride in looking over my fields.  The Queen herself comes to fetch my grains come harvest time, and farmers the land over come to buy my seeds.  But the trick of growing the best wheat is actually in the special fertilizer I use - unicorn manure!
data.description:
You are in the tool shed.
a shed with tools hanging from hooks. there are various hoes and shovels. it's for seaweed harvest
There's a shack, a shovel, a hooks, a barrel, a shed, a seaweed, a Tool, and a hoe here.
The bandit is here.

You are carrying a hoe, and wearing an overalls.

data.short_motivation: I want to dig up some holes in the farm
data.mid_motivation: I want to plant some wheat seeds today
data.long_motivation: I must have enough wheat to harvest in time for next order

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use hoe with soil to dig

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put wheat seeds on dug holes
